name: Brick
descriptions: Brick is the heavy weapons specialist in the Reilly's Rangers mercenary group in Fallout 3.
Born around 2253, the 24 year old Brick was hired by Reilly as a heavy weapons specialist. Together with her minigun, Eugene, the muscle-bound gunner

Brick gets along fine with most of the Rangers. She sees them as eggheads, with more skill in sciences and such, than combat, which is fine by her. She just points, shoots, and makes anything that gets in the Rangers' way die.
Brick has a peculiar relationship with Eugene, or rather, Euegenes, as she has multiple miniguns sharing the same name.

While Brick might be suffering from some form of personality disorder, it is equally possible that she simply enjoys the gore and destruction, and plays it up. If asked about whether she is "certifiably insane," she is quick to joke that she killed the last person who said that, and asks Eugene for an opinion.
Brick appears in Fallout 3 and Fallout: Wasteland Warfare.
The game guide gives Brick's age as 32,

topics.response_text: Did ya see me? Nothing good ole' Eugene and a few hundred rounds of ammo couldn't handle.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, Brick... You really, um, ventilated them...
topics.response_text: You bet your ass I did! Did you see that Super Mutant's head burst? Beautiful!

topics.topic_text: Has anyone ever spoken to you about anger management?
topics.response_text: Well, someone did once, and I swear I let them leave only with a slight limp.
Last guy who said something like that to me took a long dirt nap. Catch my drift?

topics.topic_text: What's been happening since you've been back?
topics.response_text: Now that you're part of the team, Reilly is her old self again.

topics.topic_text: Where can I get some more ammo around here?
topics.response_text: Well, if you've picked the Mutie corpses clean, there isn't much else to scrounge.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Vernon Square?
topics.response_text: The other guys hate mappin' this zone, but hey, I love it. I love turning the 'muties into a fine, red mist with my gun.

topics.topic_text: I have a Fission Battery that will fix that express elevator.
topics.response_text: Well, what the fuck you bringin' it to me for? Get it plugged into the elevator!

topics.topic_text: Here, I brought you some ammo.
How have you guys survived up here?
topics.response_text: Skill baby, pure skill. And my big-ass gun!

topics.topic_text: Any clue where I can find a Fission Battery?
topics.response_text: All I remember is mowing down Super Mutants with Eugene here.

conversation.response_text: Hey, all right! Me 'n Eugene are glad to see ya!
